Trade/Device Name(s): RapidFRET Oral Fluid Assay for Amphetamine
RapidFRET Oral Fluid Amphetamine Calibrator Set
RapidFRET Oral Fluid Amphetamine Control Set
Specimen Container(s): Glass sample tube with inert screw cap
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for RapidFRET Oral Fluid Assay for Amphetamine for qualitative screening of amphetamine in oral fluid using a time-resolved fluorescence FRET immunoassay
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative screening for amphetamine at 50 ng/mL in neat oral fluid collected with the RapidEASE Oral Fluid Collector, for prescription use in central laboratories on the RapidFRET Integrated Workstation; provides preliminary results, requiring confirmation by more specific methods such as GC/MS or LC/MS/MS.
